Definition: Packet receipt time at the server, recorded as an ISO-8601 UTC timestamp string.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server
QA/Validation: Parsable datetime; within declared temporal coverage

Definition: IPv4 address of the VRU sensor or collection node that sent the packet.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Top-level SAE J2735 message type code identifying the frame as a Personal Safety Message.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Nested duplicate of the SAE J2735 message type code copied from the frame header.
Label/Description: Duplicate message type in nested packet
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Encoded PSM entity type (e.g., VRU device category) as defined in SAE J2735.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Milliseconds offset within the current minute at message generation time, 0–59999.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Rolling sequence counter for PSMs from the device, cycling through values 0–127.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Pseudonymized device identifier represented as space-separated hexadecimal byte values.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Latitude position scaled by 1e7, representing WGS84 latitude in 1e-7 degree units.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Longitude position scaled by 1e7, representing WGS84 longitude in 1e-7 degree units.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Elevation in decimeters, with −4096 used as a sentinel value for “unavailable”.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Semi-major axis of horizontal position accuracy ellipse, in meters (0–255, 255=max/unknown).
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Semi-minor axis of horizontal position accuracy ellipse, in meters (0–255, 255=max/unknown).
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Orientation of the horizontal accuracy ellipse in deci-degrees, 65535 indicating unavailable.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Encoded speed in 0.02 m/s units, with value 8191 indicating speed unavailable.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server

Definition: Encoded heading in 0.0125-degree units, with value 28800 indicating heading unavailable.
Source/Provenance: NoTraffic to City of Phoenix server
